
# Class 1 {.ct}

## Reaction Engineering, Ethics, and Safety {.ch}

Class 1 defines reaction engineering. Codes of engineering ethics are presented and the importance of safety in chemical processing is stressed.

## Learning Outcomes {.ch}

After completing Class 1 you should...

1. have some understanding of what reaction engineering is
2. be aware of the AIChE code of ethics and your responsibility to adhere to it
3. know that failure to operate chemical processes safely can lead property damage, injury, or death
